com.st.st25sdk

Class ControlTlv

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.ControlTlv

  • public class ControlTlv
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines all required methods to handle a NFC Forum CONTROL TLV block NFCForum-TS-T1T-1.0 specification NFCForum-TS-T2T-1.0 specification NFCForum-TS-T5T-1.0 specification

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte LOCK_CONTROL_TLV
      Lock Control TLV structure name (NFC Type1 : Defines details of lock bytes / NFC Type2 : Encodes the location of Dynamic Lock bits / NFC Type5 : RFU)
      static byte MEMORY_CONTROL_TLV
      Memory Control TLV structure name (NFC Type1 : Identifies Reserved Memory Areas / NFC Type2 : Encodes the location of Reserved Memory Areas / NFC Type5 : RFU)
      static byte NDEF_MESSAGE_TLV
      NDEF Message TLV structure name
      static byte NULL_TLV
      Null TLV structure name (NFC FORUM Type1/Type2 : used for padding of memory areas / NFC Type5 : RFU)
      static byte PROPRIETARY_TLV
      Proprietary TLV structure name
      static byte TERMINATOR_TLV
      NDEF Terminator TLV structure name

    • Constructor Summary

      ControlTlv(byte[] buffer)
      Build an instance of a Control Tlv object from provided raw data
      ControlTlv(byte[] buffer, int offset)
      Build an instance of a Control Tlv object from provided raw data
